docs.lead_paragraph: Persons who each year donate to The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund sent in their gifts again yesterday from as widely scattered places as Paris, France, and Los Angeles, Calif. They were among the 531 donors who added $11,892.27 to this year's Christmas appeal for the fund.

headline.main: DONORS FROM AFAR AID NEEDIEST CASES; Gifts Received From Persons Who for Years Have Taken Part in Yule Appeal 531 ADD $11,892 TO FUND Pleasure in Helping Is Voiced by Many -- Largest Donation of the Day Is $2,456

docs.snippet: Persons who each year donate to The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund sent in their gifts again yesterday from as widely scattered places as Paris, France, and Los Angeles, Calif. They were among the 531 donors who added $11,892.27 to this year's...

docs.lead_paragraph: IT is Christmas time and New York is ablaze with light. This is the outer glow and it brings with it gutter and cheer. But there is another kind of light that brings something deeper and more lasting. It is the glow that is between friend and friend, between neighbor and neighbor.

headline.main: AT CHRISTMAS REMEMBER THE NEEDIEST!; The Warmest Glow of Yuletide Comes From Helping Others
